API Documentation

Backend API Reference

This section provides detailed documentation for the AeraSync backend API.

  • Main API
    • Main API Module
  • Aerator Comparer
    • Aerator Comparer Module

Main API Endpoint

FastAPI backend for AeraSync Aerator Comparison API. Handles incoming requests for aerator comparisons and health checks.

async backend.api.main.health_check()[source]

Health check endpoint to verify service status.

async backend.api.main.compare_aerators_endpoint(request: dict)[source]

Compare aerators based on provided JSON input. Expects TOD, farm area, financial parameters, and list of aerators.

async backend.api.main.read_root()[source]

Root endpoint with a welcome message.

Aerator Comparer Module

aerator_comparer.py This module provides functionality to compare different aerators based on their specifications and financial metrics. It includes functions to calculate NPV, IRR, payback period, ROI, and profitability index. It also handles the processing of incoming requests and returns the comparison results in a structured format.

backend.api.aerator_comparer.calculate_npv(cash_flows, discount_rate, inflation_rate)[source]

Calculate the Net Present Value (NPV) of a series of cash flows.

Parameters:

  • cash_flows – List of cash flows

  • discount_rate – Discount rate as a decimal

  • inflation_rate – Inflation rate as a decimal

Returns:

NPV value

backend.api.aerator_comparer.newton_raphson(func, func_prime, x0, tol=1e-06, maxiter=100)[source]

Newton-Raphson method for finding roots of a function.

Parameters:

  • func – Function for which to find the root

  • func_prime – Derivative of the function

  • x0 – Initial guess

  • tol – Tolerance for convergence

  • maxiter – Maximum number of iterations

Returns:

Approximate root

backend.api.aerator_comparer.calculate_irr(initial_investment, cash_flows)[source]

Calculate the Internal Rate of Return (IRR) for a series of cash flows.

Parameters:

  • initial_investment – Initial investment amount

  • cash_flows – List of cash flows

Returns:

IRR value as a percentage

backend.api.aerator_comparer.calculate_payback(initial_investment, cash_flows)[source]

Calculate the payback period for a series of cash flows.

Parameters:

  • initial_investment – Initial investment amount

  • cash_flows – List of cash flows

Returns:

Payback period in years

backend.api.aerator_comparer.calculate_roi(initial_investment, cash_flows)[source]

Calculate the Return on Investment (ROI) for a series of cash flows.

Parameters:

  • initial_investment – Initial investment amount

  • cash_flows – List of cash flows

Returns:

ROI value as a percentage

backend.api.aerator_comparer.calculate_profitability_k(npv, initial_investment)[source]

Calculate the profitability index (PI) for a series of cash flows.

Parameters:

  • npv – Net Present Value (NPV)

  • initial_investment – Initial investment amount

Returns:

Profitability index (PI) value

backend.api.aerator_comparer.calculate_sae(sotr, power_hp)[source]

Calculate the Specific Aeration Efficiency (SAE) for an aerator.

Parameters:

  • sotr – Standard Oxygen Transfer Rate (SOTR)

  • power_hp – Power in horsepower (HP)

Returns:

SAE value

backend.api.aerator_comparer.calculate_equilibrium_price(baseline_cost, winner_cost_no_price, winner_units)[source]

Calculate the equilibrium price for an aerator based on baseline costs and winner costs.

Parameters:

  • baseline_cost – Baseline cost of the aerator

  • winner_cost_no_price – Cost of the winning aerator without price

  • winner_units – Number of units of the winning aerator

Returns:

Equilibrium price

backend.api.aerator_comparer.process_aerator(aerator, tod, farm_area_ha, financial, baseline_costs)[source]

Process a single aerator and calculate its financial metrics.

Parameters:

  • aerator – Aerator object

  • tod – Total Oxygen Demand (TOD)

  • farm_area_ha – Farm area in hectares

  • financial – FinancialInput object

  • baseline_costs – Dictionary of baseline costs for comparison

Returns:

AeratorResult object with calculated metrics

backend.api.aerator_comparer.compare_aerators(data)[source]

Compares multiple aerators based on their specifications and financial metrics. Returns the results including the winner and equilibrium prices.

backend.api.aerator_comparer.handler(request)[source]

Handles incoming requests for aerator comparison. Parses the request body and returns the comparison results.

backend.api.aerator_comparer.main(request)[source]

Main function to run the aerator comparison. This function is designed to be called from an AWS Lambda function or similar environment.
